PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 35-year-old married woman living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. sarah is a white non-hispanic american born and raised in the country. she holds a postgraduate degree and works in a professional field.

sarah is a devout roman catholic, attending religious services once a week. her religious beliefs and conservative ideology align with her affiliation with the republican party. despite her middle-income status, with a family income between $90,000 and $100,000, sarah is not currently registered to vote at her current address.

in her free time, sarah enjoys volunteering and frequently uses the internet multiple times a day. she leads an active lifestyle, taking advantage of the amenities and opportunities available in her metropolitan area. sarah values her education, faith, and traditional values, which shape her worldview and way of life.
